articles.title: Sunak ‘risks full-scale trade war’ with Brussels by scrapping EU laws - The Guardian
articles.description: Leading European politicians have warned that the prime minister’s plan to ditch EU legislation will trigger retaliatory countermeasures, including imposing tariffs on goods
articles.content:
Rishi Sunaks plan to scrap thousands of EU laws by the end of this year risks triggering a full-scale trade war between the UK and Brussels, senior figures in the European Union have warned.

articles.title: Ukraine's president vows to fight 'for as long as we can' for strategic city Bakhmut - Euronews
articles.description: While hosting European Union chiefs in Kyiv, Ukrainian President Volodmyr Zelenskyy has vowed to defend the city of Bakhmut "for as long as we can".
articles.content:

articles.title: European police arrest 42 after cracking covert messaging app - News24
